dialogue.text: Well ain't that a loaded question.
I know our future will be right here keeping everyone up to date on all things going on in the music world, right, Synthetic?
You know it, Sunny. Though who knows what the future of that world will be...
Especially for Sweet and Sour! I hope they keep going strong for a long time and make more amazing music!
There's something big waiting for them, I can just feel it!
I don't know why, but deep down, my code keeps telling me that wherever they end up...
...it'll be far beyond just funkin' around.
We'll just have to wait and see! Gosh, I'm so excited!
